text: I promise to always listen, truly listen, when you speak from your heart.
I promise to celebrate your victories as if they were my own.
I promise to hold you gently through every storm.
I promise to remind you of your strength when you forget.
I promise to choose you, every single day, in every single way.
I promise to make you laugh when the world feels too heavy.
I promise to grow with you, not apart from you.
I promise to be your safe space, your home, your constant.
I promise to love you not just for who you are, but for who you're becoming.
